remarks: Properties that determine an absolute value.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isabvd.a $e |- ( ph -> A = ( AbsVal ` R ) ) $.
isabvd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
isabvd.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` R ) ) $.
isabvd.t $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .r ` R ) ) $.
isabvd.z $e |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` R ) ) $.
isabvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
isabvd.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : B --> RR ) $.
isabvd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` .0. ) = 0 ) $.
isabvd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ x =/= .0. ) -> 0 < ( F ` x ) ) $.
isabvd.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ x =/= .0. ) /\ ( y e. B /\ y =/= .0. ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) x. ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isabvd.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ x =/= .0. ) /\ ( y e. B /\ y =/= .0. ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) <_ ( ( F ` x ) + ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isabvd $p |- ( ph -> F e. A ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
